name: A Fragrant Feast of Flavors
desc: Emilie's specialty. The fermented fruit juice holds a subtle floral fragrance that fills your palate with woody scents, while the silken cream glides alongside, imparting both taste and flavor in moderation. The afterglow of the abundant aroma lingers on, an indelible gourmet encounter.

value.text: Increases all party members' ATK by 274 for 300s. In Co-Op Mode, this effect only applies to your own character(s).

customize.name: Recipe: Fricassee de Poulet
customize.desc: A detailed step-by-step recipe for making Fricassee de Poulet.

customize.name: Fricassee de Poulet
customize.desc: A well-known Fontainian meat dish. The meat is first fried in oil until the skin is a delicious crispy brown, then stir-fried with onions and other condiments, before adding fermented fruit juice and stewing â€” and don't forget to add cream once the soup thickens. When ready, every last piece of meat is wrapped uniformly in cream, giving it that warm, familiar flavor that Fontainians love.

customize.name: Emilie
customize.desc: A Fontainian perfumer, one who bottles secrets.

customize.name: A Fragrant Feast of Flavors
customize.desc: Emilie's specialty. The fermented fruit juice holds a subtle floral fragrance that fills your palate with woody scents, while the silken cream glides alongside, imparting both taste and flavor in moderation. The afterglow of the abundant aroma lingers on, an indelible gourmet encounter.

customize.name: Fowl
customize.desc: A fresh chunk of fowl. Handled properly, it can make a hearty meal.

customize.name: Fermented Juice
customize.desc: A fermented juice with a unique fruity scent. It is often used as a marinade.

customize.name: Onion
customize.desc: A spherical vegetable. As vengeance for cutting it, it will make you cry, no matter how brave you are.

customize.name: Cream
customize.desc: A dairy product made from milk. An essential ingredient in making pastries.
